combatSkills.name: Femme Rivière
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Ultra Fire M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost and Ultra Unguard Rate & [Allies] removes Status Debuffs exc. Assist Skills

combatSkills.name: Inner Fire
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Avoids K.O x1 only when HP≧10% (removed when HP<10%) & Str., Mag. and Fire Attack Dmg.+25%/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Blaze Bringer
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Super Fire M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost and Ultra Penetration rate & [Foes] 20% MP Drain

combatSkills.name: Flame Lift
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Fire M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost and Ultra Unguard Rate & [Foe] 15% MP Drain

passiveSkills.name: Will of Fire
passiveSkills.description: When countering and attacking, regular M.Attack a Foe with Fire Element.
